entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handle event accessors from metadata marked `[UnscopedRef]` #66274
  • Refactor option (use explicit type) missing #66272
  • After last update VS stops suggest "Introduce local variable " #66271
  • Strange Behaviour for: semanticModel.GetConversion(someTypeExpression) #66270
  • Internal Compiler Error for ExplicitTuple conversion in CodeGen/Emit #66265
    17.6
  • CompileExpressionTests.SequencePointsMultipleDocuments failing #66260
  • [LSP] Remove NFW reporting in `RangeToTextSpan` after issue is fixed #66258

Closed

  • Cannot activate language client Roslyn Language Server Client in Visual Studio #66262
  • Roslyn workspace should share SyntaxTrees across project targets when possible. #65278
    17.5
  • Template "Analyzer with code fix (.NET Standard)" does not work with VS2022 #66266
  • CS0121 diagnostic produced when an overload is obvious #66221

PullRequests

Created

  • Update VisualStudioTelemetry to 16.4.67 #66275
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove workarounds for fixed issues #66267
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Disallow more locals of restricted type in async methods #66264
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • [LSP] Temporarily report NFWs in `RangeToTextSpan` #66259
    Area-IDE
  • Infrastructure/use different images #66255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle capturing of primary constructor parameters within queries and in type-or-value scenarios #66254
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • use dnceng vms to kickoff helix runs #66253
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66273
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Unify `ConstantValueOpt` and `ConstantValue` properties #66248
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66252
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Port #66241 to Dev17.5 #66269
    Area-IDE
  • Disable testing SequencePointsMultipleDocuments with DebugInformationFormat.Pdb #66261
    Area-Interactive, Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2079913 #66268
  • Fix potential invalid TextSpan when reporting FAR results #66245
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66257
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66256
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix a couple of cases where feature options were not being hooked up. #66241
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Mitigate crash in navigate-to. #66242
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move VS specific option storage locations to VS layer #66042
    Area-IDE, Next
  • workaround tabular data control focus issue #66247
    Area-IDE
  • Remove usage of Workspace.Options from AutomationObject #66211
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66276
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Report error implementing interface with `[UnscopedRef]` member #66024
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Include [UnscopedRef] parameter attributes in synthesized delegate types #66035
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
  • Apply XAML template on AbstractCheckBoxViewModel instead of one specific subclass #66238
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review
  • Adjust assert to account for error scenarios #66202
    Area-Compilers
  • Support Go To Definition in Object Browser for metadata references #66026
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure that side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66250
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Emit stackalloc block initializer for byte-sized enums #66251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Generate static field for ReadOnlySpan created from array without an initializer (#33088) #37897
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers
